rows.label: qst701804_msg0001
rows.name:
How's this for an example piece?
Hopefully it's a bit easier to work from.

rows.label: qst701804_msg0002
rows.name:
Yeah, I think I can do this!
I just have to copy your stitches!

rows.label: qst701804_msg0003
rows.name:
You can take your time with it.
Just go one stitch at a time, OK?

rows.label: qst701804_msg0004
rows.name: Yep! I'm gonna get it this time!

rows.label: qst701804_msg0005
rows.name: I...I DID IT!

rows.label: qst701804_msg0006
rows.name: Sata!

rows.label: qst701804_msg0007
rows.name:
Look! I can embroider! I know I'm
not very good, but I still tried...and
succeeded!

rows.label: qst701804_msg0008
rows.name:
Well? I held up my end of the promise.
I learned how to do needlework. That
means you gotta give me a smile.

rows.label: qst701804_msg0009
rows.name: Don't you ever give up?

rows.label: qst701804_msg0010
rows.name:
Nope. When something's important,
you can't let it slip away. Otherwise
you just regret it forever.

rows.label: qst701804_msg0011
rows.name:
Look, sometimes things are tough, and
you can't do anything about it. That's
when you gotta just, like...smile it away.

rows.label: qst701804_msg0012
rows.name:
I know that the bad stuff sticks with
you. And some of it you're never
going to get rid of.

rows.label: qst701804_msg0013
rows.name:
But you have to find a way to
conquer it somehow.

rows.label: qst701804_msg0014
rows.name: If you don't, it'll keep piling up.

rows.label: qst701804_msg0016
rows.name:
I'm here with you, Satahiko.
Let's just take it one day at a time.

rows.label: qst701804_msg0017
rows.name:
Whatever happens, we'll smile it away.
Together, yeah? And if there's anyone
who looks like they're in trouble, well...

rows.label: qst701804_msg0018
rows.name:
We'll do our best to help them out.
Like good people do. Like Master
Adel and Laura.

rows.label: qst701804_msg0019
rows.name:
What a wonderful plan!
I'll help you!

rows.label: qst701804_msg0020
rows.name:
I'm actually something of an expert
at making people smile!

rows.label: qst701804_msg0021
rows.name:
Er...I think we're good for now.
Nobody here's feeling particularly
bad at the moment.

rows.label: qst701804_msg0022
rows.name:
Oh.
I see. Yes, of course.

rows.label: qst701804_msg0023
rows.name:
Ahh! But, you know, actually, I
suddenly feel like I need to smile!

rows.label: qst701804_msg0024
rows.name: ...Really?

rows.label: qst701804_msg0025
rows.name: Stupid.

rows.label: qst701804_msg0026
rows.name: See, Sata need a smile as well!

rows.label: qst701804_msg0027
rows.name: Wait-

rows.label: qst701804_msg0028
rows.name:
He's such a cheeky brat.
But maybe that's what we need.
